algorithm_technique: Greedy approach to minimize health loss by using armor optimally.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the minimum starting health needed to complete game levels, considering armor can be used once.
problem_summary_technical: Determine minimum health by summing all damage, subtracting the maximum damage mitigated by armor (capped by armor value), and adding 1.
key_insights: The armor should be used on the level with the maximum damage to maximize its benefit.
The total health needed is the sum of all damage, minus the damage saved by armor, plus one.
The armor's effectiveness is capped by its value; it can't negate more damage than it provides.
